title: Kyler Murray contract changed, DK Metcalf paid, Training Camp questions/answers, and Lamar Jackson contract standstill
itunes:title: Kyler Murray contract changed, DK Metcalf paid, Training Camp questions/answers, and Lamar Jackson contract standstill
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with the Cardinals removing a study clause from Kyler Murray's new contract. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Mike Garofolo, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty give their thoughts on Murray's press conference to address the issue.  We ask Training Camp questions before exploring Lamar Jackson still waiting for a new deal.  Jason explains why he understands Dak Prescott wanting to look back at the disastrous way last season ended.  Plus, the table looks at what players they're expecting to see make a big leap this season.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
